attr.title: UDRL_Modify
attr.desc:
Thanks to Ian Spadin for releasing this gem of a game for free!

Game originally published under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 by Ian Spadin on itch.io 
Modified by Kompaan to be 1:1 aspect ratio for handhelds, as published here
https://github.com/mhoogcarspel/UDRL_Modify/tree/handheld_ui
attr.inst: This port is ready to run!
